description:
Okami, Tanuki, Oni, Amaterasu, Kitsune and other gods are waiting for you. Your goal is to establish a romantic relationship and pass the tests. Are you ready to receive your reward?

Features:
14 goddesses are waiting for you.
Relaxing music.
Meditative gameplay.
Interactive gallery.
name: Erogods: Sunrise
intro: Erogods: Sunrise - is a dating simulator with feminized Japanese gods.
